text: And the borders continue on to 15. 7 So the Greek. There seems to be a reading of the word דברה as if part of רבע.the fourth part of the valley of Achor, and go down to Galgal, which is before the approach of Adammin, which is southward in the valley, and terminate at the water of the fountain of the sun; and their going forth shall be the fountain of Rogel.
